pages.text: The Alloy Kiln is where your first alloys are born.$(br2)The Alloy Kiln works much like a furnace, but there are multiple material inputs, which are melted down into a single material output.$(br2)Not all alloys can be smelted in the Alloy Kiln, though; More complex alloys require the $(l)$(l:block_blast_alloy_kiln)Blast Alloy Kiln$().
